availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Shivell (Louisville Attorney/10 KY Cavalry)

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Enlisted in company H of the 10th Kentucky Cavalry during the Civil War. Worked as an attorney in Louisville in 1865. Partner at Bush & Shivell law firm in Louisville with Samuel Stone Bush.

bibl.p: U.S. IRS Tax Assessment List, 1862-1918, Kentucky, Louisville, 1865, page 23.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, page 142.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, Roll 0104, 1240, "Henry C Shivell."
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, "Henry C Shivell," https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=104881685&ref=acom accessed 06/01/2017.
